IGI Releases

Welcome to IGI Releases pages!

You'll find here usefull information regarding INFN developed grid middleware software releases, roadmaps, documentation and support.

  • Introduction
  • Release Repositories
  • Supported platforms
  • Release Content
  • Release Schedule
    • Extended Attribute support

 

Introduction

The IGI Release represents the collection of the grid middleware software developed by INFN:

  • CREAM products
    • BLAH - Batch Local Ascii Helper
    • CREAM CE - Computing Resource Execution And Management
    • CREAM modules for LSF, TORQUE, SLURM
    • CREAM clients
    • Cluster
  • DGAS
  • StoRM
  • VOMS
  • WMS
